Factors associate postpartum urinary retention include : ( 1 ) Nulliparous woman . ( 2 ) Prolonged labour , especially prolonged second stage . ( 3 ) Assisted/instrumental delivery . ( 4 ) Perineal injury . ( 5 ) Caesarean section . ( 6 ) Regional analgesia . Treatment begin supportive measure enhance likelihood micturition , ambulation , privacy , warm bath .
